overview: The sudden departure of Dr. Carol Lewis from Talk Radio leaves Duffy La Rue as the emergency replacement while the station embarks on a nationwide talent search. The recipient of this search is Dr. Connie Morris, a recent PhD graduate in psychology. This young beautiful vivacious new talk show host opens up new dimensions in the explorations of sex as Connie interacts with a nation of listeners. The huge cast, filled with multiple subplots guarantees erotic pleasure for all pleasure seekers.
title: Talk Dirty to Me 8
